mapper.insert: INSERT INTO store (id, `name`, sufname, province, city, district, address, `time`, updatetime, parented, state, uid) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{sufname}, #{province}, #{city}, #{district}, #{address}, now(), #{updatetime}, #{parented}, 0, #{uid})
mapper.select:
SELECT s.*,u.name as uname FROM `store` AS s INNER JOIN `user` AS u ON s.id=u.storeid
AND s.`name` LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{name},'%')
and u.`rid` IN (1,2) and u.state IN(0,1)
mapper.update:
UPDATE `store` SET state=3 WHERE id IN
#{i}
